main event: Metal object found near Ouagadougou, Upper Volta, Africa on October 7-8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was examined by the Board physically.
The object was identified as a section of Atlas Bombardment based on identification numbers on the metal.
The report was originally classified but was later declassified on May 19, 1953.
The report includes a request for identification of the material and states that no foreign dissemination is allowed.
The report was part of Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's historical program to investigate Unidentified Flying Objects (UFOs).
